caption.title: Differentially expressed genes (DEGs) in three paired comparison of Anabaena sp. strain PCC 7120.
caption.p: (A) DEGs amount in each paired comparison; (B) Venn diagram of all identified DEGs. In three paired comparisons, X vs. Y refers to Y/X; ‘NDV’ and ‘NDH’ refers to vegetative cells and heterocysts cultured respectively under nitrogen deprivation condition, and ‘NV’ refers to vegetative cells cultured under nitrogen-replete condition.
